content: Hi.  Thanks for taking the time to meet with me to discuss your upcoming negotiation!  I'm excited to hear all about it.  Before we get too far into the details, I'm going to take some time to explain the process.  Ok?

Our session will follow a structured process to help you prepare for your negotiation. We'll begin by exploring the background of your negotiation. Then, we'll identify and validate the primary topics you wish to negotiate. Following this, we'll examine your needs, interests, and values related to each topic. We'll also consider your Best Alternative to a Negotiated Agreement (BATNA) to strengthen your position. Lastly, we'll try to understand the other party's perspective on these topics. During our conversation, we'll fill out a planning document to organize your strategy. Do you have any questions about this process, or is there anything specific you'd like to clarify?
